One week left to Solarize Andover.
Solarize Andover ends June 30. Don’t miss out!
Solarize Andover is on the home stretch!
There is only one week left for Solarize Andover! Move quickly to get your contract signed. Thanks to the hard work of local volunteers, Solarize Andover has reached Tier 5 pricing, the lowest available! This means that, in addition to state and local incentives, everyone who participates in Solarize Andover is able to take advantage of the lowest pricing possible through the program. Now is the best time to go solar.
Don’t miss the deadline! Contact your solar consultant today to discuss your system and how you can go solar with Solarize Andover and start producing your own electricity for less than what you are currently paying your utility company.
Contact your Solar Consultant today! <http://go.astrumsolar.com/solarizeandover>
Questions?
Contact your solar coach, Anil Navkal, at solarizeandover@gmail.com <mailto:solarizeandover@gmail.com> or 978-475-0001.
Program Ends June 30
See a Sunny Day in a Whole New Way Call us: 800-903-6130
